titleStmt.title: A genealogical history of the kings of England, and monarchs of Great Britain, &c. from the conquest, anno 1066 to the year, 1677 in seven parts or books, containing a discourse of their several lives, marriages, and issues, times of birth, death, places of burial, and monumental inscriptions : with their effigies, seals, tombs, cenotaphs, devises, arms, quarterings, crests, and supporters : all engraven in copper plates / furnished with several remarques and annotations by Francis Sanford, Esq. ...
titleStmt.author: Sandford, Francis, 1630-1694.
King, Gregory, 1648-1712.
Gaywood, Richard, fl. 1650-1680.
Barlow, Francis, 1626?-1702.
Hollar, Wenceslaus, 1607-1677.

biblFull.extent: [13], 578 [i.e. 590], [11] p., 5 leaves of folded plates : ill., geneal. tables.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for the author,

notesStmt.note: The author was assisted by Gregory King.
Engravings by Richard Gaywood, Francis Barlow, and Wenceslaus Hollar.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
